meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Miriam Kadansky Steve Schneider Wes Johnson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4436.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Miriam Kadansky, a research manager from Westford, Massachusetts
Steve Schneider, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Wes Johnson, a band manager and attorney from Columbia, South Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,200)

tr.td: TIME'S PERSON OF THE YEAR
BANDS IN OTHER WORDS
SHELLFISH
BRAND "X"
(Alex: Each correct response will end with that letter of the alphabet.)
MATERIAL GUYS
CAN I HAVE A WORD WITH YOU?

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Albert Einstein was the Person of the Century; in 1949 this British statesman was the man of the half-century')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Albert Einstein was the Person of the Century; in 1949 this British statesman was the man of the half-century
